Magister Rollant:
Becoming a Wizard is not easy. The most important thing to learn, and one of the hardest lessons, is how to open your heart to the bountiful energy of nature. How to taste it, breathe it, and draw it into your soul. Until you figure that out, you won't be able to learn anything. Don't look so distressed, you're in luck. Dion is a good place to learn these lessons...
